eg.document

Class TextDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.TextDocument

  • public final class TextDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents the text document and text style which is edited during typing

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextDocument(EditArea editArea)
      Creates a TextDocument
      TextDocument(EditArea editArea, Languages lang)
      Creates a TextDocument with a specified language.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextDocument

        public TextDocument(EditArea editArea)
        Creates a TextDocument
        Parameters:
        editArea - the reference to the EditArea

      • TextDocument

        public TextDocument(EditArea editArea,
                    Languages lang)
        Creates a TextDocument with a specified language.

        The language is overridden when a file is assigned.

        Parameters:
        editArea - the reference to the EditArea
        lang - the language that is one of the constants in Languages

      • colorSearchedText

        public void colorSearchedText(java.lang.String[] searchTerms,
                              boolean constrainWord)
        Colors in keyword color text elements specified by the array of search terms.

        The method returns with a warning if the current language is not plain text.

        Parameters:
        searchTerms - the array of Strings that contain search terms
        constrainWord - true to color only words
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if searchTerms is null or contains empty Strings
